Class: HLFTxEventHandler

(protected) HLFTxEventHandler(eventHubs, txId, timeout)

Class representing a connection to a business network running on Hyperledger
Fabric, using the hfc module.

Constructor

(protected) new HLFTxEventHandler(eventHubs, txId, timeout)

Construct a Tx Event Handler.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
eventHubs Array.<EventHub>

the event hubs to listen for tx events
txId String

the txid that is driving the events to occur
timeout Integer

how long (in seconds) to wait for events to occur.

  • hlftxeventhandler.js, line 25

Methods

cancelListening()

cancel listening for events

  • hlftxeventhandler.js, line 109

startListening()

Start listening for events.

Source:
  • hlftxeventhandler.js, line 47

waitForEvents() → {Promise}

wait for all event hubs to send the tx event.

Source:
  • hlftxeventhandler.js, line 94
Returns:

a promise which is resolved when all the events have been received, rejected if an error occurs.
